page.title: 13TIME TO LET YOUR HAIR DOWN!
page.content: The{PRAM RACE}takes place in Edenbridge every year, run by the Edenbridge Round Table. It consists of teams of three people who push some sort of pram from pub to pub.The money raised goes to charity.It has been going for ten years.This year there wasn't a pram race because there were so many events on in Edenbridge,that the police wouldn't shut the main road for the pram race and most of the public went to other events. {THE EDENBRIDGE AND OXTED AGRICULTURAL {SHOW}takes place every year in August in a field off the main road at the southern end of Edenbridge. The agricultural show has tents that are full of art and craft,leather garments, flowers, cattle, sheep and a dog racing course....by Anita Cross and Michelle Hewlett.
